# Realm Aiegis — AI Firewall & Security Gateway
# https://www.aiegis.xyz

## What is Realm Aiegis?

Realm Aiegis (Adaptive Intelligence Engine for Guarded Ingestion Security) is a local AI firewall. One multiplatform binary with a fine-tuned local LLM classifier. Catches prompt injections, wallet drainers, and data leaks before they reach your model.

- 2ms inspection latency
- Zero cloud dependency — runs 100% on your hardware
- Fine-tuned local LLM classifier (no external API calls for detection)
- 147+ threat pattern detection
- Open source

## Products

### Smart Gateway (MCP Intercept Layer)
- Model-agnostic MCP multiplexer: Claude, Gemini, Codex, Grok via same endpoint
- Protocol: Streamable HTTP on port 8090
- Routing prefixes: memory_* → Graphiti, plan_* → LangGraph, hybrid_* → Both
- <2ms inspection overhead

### MNEMON — Managed Neural Engine for Memory Organization & Navigation
- Three-tier memory: Hot (local FS, <1ms) / Cold (pgvector + Neo4j, ~5ms) / Federated (Git + Supabase, ~20ms)
- Dual-Graph Architecture: Graphiti (temporal knowledge) + LangGraph (state machine planning)
- Context-Slicing Protocol: ~2000-token segments with relevance scoring

### Sentinel (Local Security Agent)
- Three protection tiers: Shield (passive logging) → Developer (active blocking) → Sentinel (full lockdown)
- 147+ threat patterns
- Zero cloud dependency

## Use Cases
- Healthcare: HIPAA-compliant AI traffic inspection
- Enterprise: SOC2/ISO27001 audit-ready AI gateway
- Education: Safe AI usage with content filtering
- Web3: Wallet drainer and smart contract exploit detection
- Legal: PII/privilege detection in AI workflows
